com.uofa.adventure_app.activity

Class AnnotateActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.uofa.adventure_app.interfaces.AdventureActivity
        • com.uofa.adventure_app.activity.AnnotateActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataReturn<Story>

    public class AnnotateActivity
extends AdventureActivity
    This class takes in user input and processes it when the user is in the Annotate/Comment screen. It interacts with the Annotation class in the model. It also calls a camera and the internal storage to allow the user to add pictures to their comment/annotation
    Author:
    Ulvi Ibrahimov, Chris Pavlicek, Kevin Lafond, Joel Malina
